text:
The problem occurs when creating an svg document in memory and then trying to 
render it.
If I create an image element (with an svg image) it ends up with a broken
image (drawn to output) when the document is rendered.

When resolving a uri, in class URIResolver line:86, I
get a null pointer exception (silently caught) because the in memory dom does 
not have a documentURI.
creator: keiron@aftexsw.com

text: Should be fixed in the current CVS.
creator: deweese@apache.org
